entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Recognize FromQuery.Name when generating URL #45285
  • [Blazor Server] Sould I catch OperationCanceledException in OnParametersSetAsync/LifeCycle methods when cancelling Tasks inside it? #45282
  • Package not found error Blazor hosted wasm app while docker build #45281
  • Blazor Webassembly Dev Host returns 404 on URL with urlencoded url as path parameter #45279
  • Health Check issue with Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks 7.0.0 running on net6.0 #45278
  • ASP.Net Core Thread Starvation in high load #45277
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #45276
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.101] System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException: 'Ambiguous match found.' #45275
  • Browser print RenderFragment performance issue #45272

Closed

  • MacOS Issues #45136
  • Custom Server Sent Event in ASPNET Core #42058
    Discussions
  • Failed to authenticate HTTPS connection #43752
    Discussions
  • `Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting` latest package is `7.0.0-rc.2.22476.2` #45283
  • Using app.Urls.Add in a hosted Blazor WASM project breaks WebAssembly debugging #43703
    Discussions
  • Route Group is a fantastic feature to streamline code towards maintenance over decades with steep climb #43759
    Discussions
  • Cannot get endpoint metadata from `IApiDescriptionGroupCollectionProvider` which added by `MapXXX().Add(...)` #43792
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure
  • Run Selenium tests on Playwright via an adapter [experiment] #45284
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Support deserializing non-nested enum from string #45273
    area-grpc

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2053219 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution
